title: 03/08/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/08/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the guys return from the weekend to discuss Sunday night’s NBA All-Star game along with the Three-Point and Dunk competitions. While the format was different than in years’ past, the NBA managed to pull it off. Sports Illustrated’s Howard Beck joined the show in the first hour to discuss the weekend as well as questions surrounding Blake Griffin’s signing with the Brooklyn Nets, the Lakers’ status, and more. In the second hour, Brad Biggs, who covers the Chicago Bears for the Chicago Tribune joined to talk about if there is a realistic chance that Russell Wilson could land in the windy city.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the guys return from the weekend to discuss Sunday night’s NBA All-Star game along with the Three-Point and Dunk competitions. While the format was different than in years’ past, the NBA managed to pull it off. Sports Illustrated’s Howard Beck joined the show in the first hour to discuss the weekend as well as questions surrounding Blake Griffin’s signing with the Brooklyn Nets, the Lakers’ status, and more. In the second hour, Brad Biggs, who covers the Chicago Bears for the Chicago Tribune joined to talk about if there is a realistic chance that Russell Wilson could land in the windy city.
